page.title: 14SALTBURN:A TYPICAL SCHOOLDAY
page.content: Mum woke me up at 8.00am. I got dressed, had my breakfast of Corn Flakes before leaving for school. I called for my friend Stephen and we walked there together. We arrived at school about 8.55am. and entered at 9.00am. After registration we had a radio assembly that finished at 9.30am. Then we had maths till first playtime at 10.30am. I played soccer. When we came in we started on the Domesday Project which you are reading now. While doing that we played "Flowers of Crystal" on the computer. At 12.00pm we had lunch and playtime. I eat a packed meal made at home. After lunch I played Bulldog. Later we watched Animals in Action which was about running. At 2.30pm we had playtime until 2.45pm. Then we had a reading session and at 3.30pm we went home.(My name is Tim Thacker.)
